Maen nhw’n ffigurau trawiadol - ‘Maen nhw’ means ‘they are’. This is the present tense, third person plural form of ‘bod’(to be) used in affirmative sentences.

wedi cyrraedd - has arrived

peidiwch â phoeni - don’t fret

please let me know of any corrections

August is here! With summer holidays arrived, don’t worry , there is a lot of English and Welsh content online at Booktrust Cymru, some photo sessions together ,stories, question and answer sessions with authors and lots, lots more.

Mae mis Awst yma! Gyda Gwyliau’r Haf wedi cyrraedd, peidiwch â phoeni, mae yna lawer o gynnwys Cymraeg a Saesneg ar-lein yn BookTrust Cymru, popeth o sesiynau tynnu llun gyda’ch gilydd, straeon, sesiynau holi ac ateb gydag awduron a llawer, llawer mwy.
